skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fanspoke
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Fanspoke, where each Spoke is a unique musical experience!

This is your place to ease your mind, unwind and enjoy your favorite music in a different but mindful way.

Spokes are a brand-new way to enjoy music. Have you ever heard music that struck deep chords in you and simply got lost with it?

A Spoke combines your favorite songs with the stories, messages and inspiration behind them to unlock a totally new feeling behind your music. 

At the end of a Spoke, we hope that you feel ready to take on the world.

You can think of it as a mini-podcast or even something to accompany your morning coffee, workouts or whatever your rituals are.

Try a spoke out now! 

Let us know what you think or which artists you'd like to see by dropping a line: tahsim@fanspoke.co
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
